pkgmetadata.longdescription: Improve the Coherence of Your Time Series Data // 'R' version of 'G-Series', Statistics Canada's generalized system devoted to the benchmarking and reconciliation of time series data. The methods used in 'G-Series' essentially come from Dagum, E. B., and P. Cholette (2006) doi:10.1007/0-387-35439-5.
